VARDESC: Today how difficult are these things for you to do?  Take a bath or shower?
Today how difficult are these things for you to do?  Put on or change your hospital gown or clothes?
Today how difficult are these things for you to do?  Wash your body?
Today how difficult are these things for you to do?  Get up from the bed?
Today how difficult are these things for you to do?  Walk around in the room?

Today how difficult are these things for you to do?  Go outside your room?
Today how difficult are these things for you to do?  Be up without needing to rest?
Today how difficult are these things for you to do?  Put on or change pants?
Today how difficult are these things for you to do?  Do homework or schoolwork?
Today how difficult are these things for you to do?  Turn over or roll over in bed?
